channel.title: My new webclient
channel.description:
here's a pic of my new webclient, with embedded yahoo music player with the play buttons hidden =] no scroll at all, with saint patrics day themed banners at the bottom, working Facebook, twitter and youtube button at the bottom.
if your interested in the webclient, pm me, ill give u the source code, and instructions on how to install it to your website.
[img]http://files.enjin.com/116042/webclientpv.PNG[/img]

item.title: My new webclient
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

fasthop10:

the point was not many people have a webclient thats anymore then a black page loading the client, and the way i did it, its very easy to change the pictures to your own so you can costomize it very easyly, also im not a damn english teacher

I’m not an english teacher either, I’m just not retarded.

Read full topic
